reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 290/01: POSTING OF INFORMATION CONCERNING RIGHTS AND OBLIGATIONS
reg_info.reg_name_text: POSTING OF INFORMATION CONCERNING RIGHTS AND OBLIGATIONS
reg_info.act_under: Employment Standards Act, 2000   Loi de 2000 sur les normes d’emploi

content.content: 1. The material that is prescribed for the purposes of subsection 2 (1) of the Act is the poster prepared by the Ministry, identified as version 1.0 and entitled “What You Should Know About The Ontario Employment Standards Act”. O. Reg. 290/01, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 1. The material that is prescribed for the purposes of subsection 2 (1) of the Act is the poster prepared by the Ministry, identified as version 1.0 and entitled “What You Should Know About The Ontario Employment Standards Act”. O. Reg. 290/01, s. 1.

content.content: 2. The following other information is prescribed for the purposes of subsection 2 (2) of the Act: 1. Information about dispute resolution under the Act. 2. Information about the enforcement and administration of the Act. 3. How to obtain further information about the Act. O. Reg. 290/01, s. 2.
content.raw_html:
2. The following other information is prescribed for the purposes of subsection 2 (2) of the Act:

1. Information about dispute resolution under the Act.

2. Information about the enforcement and administration of the Act.

3. How to obtain further information about the Act. O. Reg. 290/01, s. 2.

content.content: 3. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation). O. Reg. 290/01, s. 3.
content.raw_html: 3. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation). O. Reg. 290/01, s. 3.
